General.Name: Liaoning He Eye Hospital Group Co. LTD.
General.Description: Liaoning He Eye Hospital Group Co., LTD. provides eye medical service and optometry services. It offers ophthalmopathy in children and elderly, refraction, and ocular surface services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Shenyang, China.
General.Address: No. 128, North Huanghe Street, Shenyang, China, 110141

1.Name: Ms. Ming  Deng
1.Title: CFO, Sec. of the Board & Director
